definition: Puyang prefecture level city in Henan
name of a river/surname Pu
positive (electric.)/sun/male principle (Taoism)/Yang, opposite: 陰|阴[yin1]
Puyang prefecture level city in Henan
Puyang county in Puyang, Henan

sentences.english: Example: A biting, cold wind below in last Sunday, and temperatures dropped sharply in PuYang.
sentences.chinese: 濮陽上週日開始颳起刺骨的寒風，氣溫也急劇下降。

sentences.english: It is especially true for Puyang County in Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 河南省濮陽縣就屬於其中的一例。

sentences.english: Rong Fu ethnic communities Puyang beat it at this time World War II.
sentences.chinese: 戎族打敗伏羲族的濮陽大戰也就在這個時候。

sentences.english: After an hour, and we arrived at Puyang.
sentences.chinese: 一小時後，我們抵達濮陽。

sentences.english: So my parents and I went to Puyang by bus.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我的父母和我乘公共汽車去濮陽。

sentences.english: Puyang lake and Dongming lake were growing in Dongpu area.
sentences.chinese: 沙三段時期，東濮地區發育濮陽湖和東明湖。
